name: Alexandre Toyer - Open Search Server
body:
### Open Search Server

Great open source search engine! [OpenSearchServer.com](http://www.open-search-server.com)

Awesome features :
* full administration web interface
* web crawler, database crawler, file system crawler
* lots of parser: HTML, Microsoft office, audio, ...
* analyzer, filters, ...
* REST API
* [and much more!](http://www.open-search-server.com/features/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
